resources.string: Number of Lectures you have attended
Enter Valid Parameters and Fire Up to Analyze
Invalid Input Parameters passed. Target attendance has be to below 99 and total number of lectures attended should be lower than total lectures conducted
You are above and beyond your target %1$s %%
You can miss the next %1$s lectures and still be above your target
Your attendance is exactly equal to your target
Your current attendance is below your target. You will have to attend %1$s lectures without break to achieve your target attendance
To find out how many lectures you\'ll have to sit to achieve your target if you miss the next lecture too, just add one to your total lectures conducted and keep your attended lectures the same
